title: Unwarranted load shedding to be penalized, it is insult to people: Union Power Minister R K Singh
description: Union Power Minister R K Singh emphasized that gratuitous load shedding will be penalized as it is considered an insult to the people of the country. During a two-day review meeting of top power and energy officials, Singh highlighted the need to eliminate load shedding and urged distribution companies (discoms) to enhance capacity, sign power purchase agreements (PPAs), and improve efficiency.
